meta.name: dc:Publisher
meta.content: Watch Tower Bible and Tract Society of Pennsylvania

level1.h1: Psalm 123 A Song of the Ascents.

p.span: To you I raise my eyes,You who are enthroned in the heavens.
2 As the eyes of servants look to the hand of their master,And the eyes of a servant girl to the hand of her mistress,So our eyes look to Jehovah our GodUntil he shows us favor.
3 Show us favor, O Jehovah, show us favor,For we have had our full share of contempt.
4 We have had our full share of ridicule from the self-assuredAnd the contempt of the arrogant.
